sentence.Network_en: The sight made my blood curdle.

entry.tran: (使)(牛奶或鸡蛋)凝结；（使）结成凝乳
entry.def: If milk or eggs curdle or if you curdle them, they separate into different bits.

means.word_mean: 3. turn from a liquid to a solid mass;

auth_sentence.content: Don't stop whisking at any point, otherwise the eggs will curdle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't stop whisking at any point, otherwise the eggs will curdle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't stop whisking at any point, otherwise the eggs will curdle.

auth_sentence.content: If the sauce begins to curdle, remove it from the heat immediately.
auth_sentence.res_content: If the sauce begins to curdle, remove it from the heat immediately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the sauce begins to curdle, remove it from the heat immediately.

auth_sentence.content: Keeping the milk on the heat, stir gently to help the milk curdle; it should only take about a minute.
